author: bridge-bot
content: <nattawatx86_gitlab> Hi. I am trying to create a tool to detect a vulnerability such as reentrancy for my master degree thesis. Now I am looking for an online course for that. Do you have some links I can begin with ? Thank you.

author: sa3083
content: Hi guys, i'm preety new to formal verification, and i might come with some dumb questions, i checked out certora and it looks preety impresive in terms of user experience (how easy it is to write the rules), what would be the most appropiate open source version of certora ?
